text: Saunterer was an American Thoroughbred racehorse. Ridden by Tom Costello, he won the 1881 Preakness Stakes and Belmont Stakes. ==References== Category:1878 racehorse births Category:Thoroughbred family 9-c Category:Racehorses bred in the United States Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:Preakness Stakes winners Category:Belmont Stakes winners
title: Saunterer
